Translations.Text: Twalav win irran lhawiyya s d ôebbi is? Itelf it Öebbi, asali $uôeS. Iskweô as ul, timejjin, Irra yas aâbôuq af allen is. Anwa ara t inhun, deffir Öebbi? Day u la tesmektayem ara
Nnan: "i illan kan, d tudert nne$, di ddunit. A nemmet, a nidir. Ad a$ in$en kan d akud". £ef ayagi, ur sâin kra n tmusni. Nitni $ilen kan
Ma mlan asen issekniyen nne£ iberrzen, anamer nnsen, siwa mara d inin: "erret ed imezwura nne$, ma tessawalem tidep
Ini: "Öebbi Issidir ikwen, sinna, Ineqq ikwen. Sinna a kwen Issemlil ass n tnekra, ur illi degs ccekk". Maca, tegwti n yimdanen ur ssinen
N Öebbi, tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Ass ideg ara d ias yimir, ass nni, ad xesôen ucmiten
A pwaliv yal lois $ef tgwecrar, yal lois ipwanced ar tezmamt is. Assa, a p$eltem ayen txeddmem
Tagi d tazmamt nne£, tessawal tidep fellawen. Nella Nepjerrid ayen akw txeddmem
Ihi, wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, a ten Issekcem, Mass nnsen, s aêunu S. Wagi d rrbeê n ûûeê
Wanag wid ijehlen: "day ur awen $ôan ara issekniyen iW? Tesme$wôem iman nnwen, tellam d agdud ibe$wviyen
Mi nnan: "ih, lemâahda n Öebbi, d tidep; imir, ur degs ccekk", tennam: "ur neéôi d acu ay d imir; $uône$ d nnwaya kan, ur nepputebbet
